CustomField.defaultValue: "Is the recipient a customer or supplier of Bayer or does it maintain any other commercial relationship with Bayer? If yes, please confirm that there is no connection with any business transaction (e. g. a hidden discount etc.) and that there are no obligations of the customer or supplier towards Bayer or a third party in the future commercial relationship deriving from the receipt of the donation. Check by Compliance Manager required"
CustomField.label: Business Affiliations Description
